heading.online-regulations: Note in accordance with the Online Dispute Resolution Regulation
heading.vsbg: Note in accordance with the Consumer Dispute Settlement Act (VSBG)
heading.responsibility: Responsible for journalistic-editorial content in accordance with Section 55 II RstV

Imprint.vat: Sales tax identification number according to Section 27a of the Sales Tax Act:
Imprint.online-regulations: Under applicable law, we are required to inform consumers of the existence of the European Online Dispute Resolution Platform, which can be used to resolve disputes without the need to go to court.
Imprint.vsbg: We are neither willing nor obliged to take part in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
Imprint.gender-sensitive: In order to make the texts easier to read, we randomly and evenly selected either the male or female form of personal nouns
Imprint.content-warning: The free and freely accessible content of this website was created with the greatest possible care.
Imprint.external-links: This website contains links to third-party websites (“external links”).
Imprint.copyright: The content published on this website is subject to German copyright and ancillary copyright law.
Imprint.special-terms: If special conditions for individual uses of this website deviate from the aforementioned paragraphs, this will be expressly pointed out at the appropriate point.

Privacy.data-processing-info: Information on data processing for the website https://semper-ki.org and https://magazin.semper-ki.org
Privacy.data-protection-summary: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit our website.
Privacy.data-collection-responsible: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
Privacy.how-we-collect-data: How do we collect your data?
Privacy.how-we-collect-details: On the one hand, your data is collected when you provide it to us.
Privacy.collected-personal-data: In order to be able to use the services offered and to process your orders properly, we collect the following personal data:
Privacy.data-details: Salutation, gender Surname, first name if applicable Company name Address Telephone number Email address Date of birth Nationality Account details IP address
Privacy.usage-purpose: For what purposes do we use your data?
Privacy.data-usage-purpose: We process the personal data you provide to carry out contractually agreed research and development tasks as well as administrative tasks, member and donor management and public relations.
Privacy.your-rights: What rights do you have regarding your data?
Privacy.rights-description: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data free of charge at any time.
Privacy.tools-analysis-details: When you visit our website, your surfing behavior can be statistically evaluated.
Privacy.data-protection-details: The operators of these sites take the protection of your personal data very seriously.
Privacy.responsible-details: The responsible body for data processing on this website is: Institute for Applied Computer Science (InfAI) e.
Privacy.controller-description: The responsible body is the natural or legal person who alone or jointly with others decides on the purposes and means of processing personal data (e.g. names, email addresses, etc.).
Privacy.consent-withdrawal: Revocation of your consent to data processing
Privacy.consent-withdrawal-details: Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent.
Privacy.objection-right: Right to object to data collection in special cases and to direct advertising (Art. 21 GDPR)
Privacy.objection-right-details: If data processing is carried out on the basis of Article 6 Paragraph 1 Letter e or f GDPR, you have the right to object to the processing of your personal data at any time for reasons arising from your particular situation;
Privacy.complaint-right: Right to lodge a complaint with the responsible supervisory authority
Privacy.complaint-right-details: In the event of violations of the GDPR, those affected have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, in particular in the member state of their habitual residence, their place of work or the place of the alleged violation.
Privacy.data-portability-details: You have the right to have data that we process automatically based on your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a common, machine-readable format.
Privacy.ssl-encryption-details: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as orders or inquiries that you send to us as the site operator, this site uses an SSL or.
Privacy.access-correction-details: Within the framework of the applicable legal provisions, you have the right to free information at any time about your stored personal data, its origin and recipient and the purpose of data processing and, if necessary, a right to correct, block or delete this data.
Privacy.right-to-restrict-processing: You have the right to request that the processing of your personal data be restricted.
Privacy.dispute-accuracy-of-data: If you dispute the accuracy of your personal data held by us, we will generally need time to verify this.
Privacy.imprint-advertising-usage-disclaimer: The use of contact details published as part of the imprint obligation to send unsolicited advertising and information materials is hereby objected to.
Privacy.mandatory-data-protection-officer: Statutory data protection officer We have appointed a data protection officer for our company.
Privacy.contact-info: Institute for Applied Computer Science (InfAI) e.
Privacy.cookie-info: Some of the websites use so-called cookies.
Privacy.server-log-info: The provider of the pages automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us.
Privacy.server-log-details: Browser type and browser version, operating system used, referrer URL, host name of the accessing computer, time of server request, IP address
Privacy.data-processing-agreement: This data will not be merged with other data sources.
Privacy.contact-form-info: If you send us inquiries using the contact form, your details from the inquiry form, including the contact details you provided there, will be stored by us in order to process the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions.
Privacy.contact-form-consent: The data entered into the contact form is therefore processed exclusively on the basis of your consent (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. a GDPR).
Privacy.data-retention: The data you enter in the contact form will remain with us until you request us to delete it, revoke your consent to storage or the purpose for data storage no longer applies (e.g. after your request has been processed).
Privacy.data-use-legal-basis: We collect, process and use personal data only to the extent that it is necessary for the establishment, content or change of the legal relationship (inventory data).
Privacy.data-details2: The customer data collected will be deleted after the order has been completed or the business relationship has ended.
Privacy.data-transfer-for-contracts: Data transfer when concluding a contract for services and digital content
Privacy.data-transfer-info: We only transmit personal data to third parties if this is necessary as part of contract processing, for example to the credit institution responsible for processing payments.
Privacy.right-to-object: Objection to data collection in special cases and to direct advertising (Art. 21 GDPR)
Privacy.data-deletion: Revocation of your consent to data processing Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent.
Privacy.share-content-via-plugins: Sharing content via plugins (Instagram, Mastodon & Co.) The content on our pages cannot yet be shared.
Privacy.google-web-fonts-info: This site uses so-called web fonts, which are provided by Google, for the uniform display of fonts.

provide-accompany.text: Contractors who support overall processes act as reliable partners throughout the customer's entire journey.
